Secondary - To investigate pharmacokinetics irinotecan hydrochloride metabolites SN-38 SN-38G . - To evaluate time tumor response , response duration , time progression patient . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord genotype status ( UGT1A1*28 v UGT1A1*6 ) Patients receive irinotecan hydrochloride IV weekly 3 week . Treatment repeat every 4 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo blood sample collection periodically pharmacogenetic , pharmacokinetic , pharmacodynamic study .
